projectComments.text: I sent Huseyin and Ivan an offer for a new Die Splitting Machine in week 41
We sent offer on the 8th of October
Offer send to Eric on the 10/10
Offer has been send by Mehmet - More info been send by me to Ivan
Mehmet offered Alcomet to buy one (or two) old presses and replace it with a complete new EGE press line
Offer has been send on 07/10
Audit was succesfully done with a total score of 46%
Offer send to Rodolfo on the 01/10
Offer send to Rodolfo on the 10/10
Offer sent to Michel on the 10/10
Visit is set for week 46 to perform an audit
Offer was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer for a gas billet oven was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer was send on the 17/02/2025
Offer was send for a partial induction billet oven on the 20/06/2025
Wefa sent their offer for coated dies to CANEX
Mehmet sent an offer to Johan for a 3-chamber single cell die oven in week 41
Offer has been send to Enrique on the 13/10
Sent an email to Roland on 09/10
Send an email to Lionel on 13/10
I have send an offer to Karthik - Maintenance Manager on 13/10
I have sent an email to Sammie on 13/10 with information - Andreas in copy
Sent an email on 13/10 asking to visit EGE in Istanbul to see some presses
Lionel forwarded the email to Erich and Samuel to evaluate the offer
Carlos told me that, for the moment, there is no interest - 13/10/25
Enrique will forward the info to the management - 13/10/25
I have send an email to José Leborans and Luis for feedback - 13/10/25
Offer was send to Claire on the 16/11/2024
Nathan told me that the final client has it for review - 15/10/25
David told me that the alu price was good but that they needed to see what to do with the die price 15/10/25
Heidi called me the 15/10 and told me they will do their audit shortly
Arjan told me that he has enough material in stock and that the next order will probably be around Feb/March 2026
